:py:mod:`depot.layout_opt.template_creation`
============================================

.. py:module:: depot.layout_opt.template_creation

.. autoapi-nested-parse::

   Utilities for converting config data, config names, templates and visu.



Module Contents
---------------


Functions
~~~~~~~~~

.. autoapisummary::

   depot.layout_opt.template_creation.save_json
   depot.layout_opt.template_creation.name_from_config
   depot.layout_opt.template_creation.config_from_name
   depot.layout_opt.template_creation.config_from_name_3a
   depot.layout_opt.template_creation.template_from_config
   depot.layout_opt.template_creation.visu_from_config
   depot.layout_opt.template_creation.ind_from_config
   depot.layout_opt.template_creation.template_from_name



Attributes
~~~~~~~~~~

.. autoapisummary::

   depot.layout_opt.template_creation.power


.. py:function:: save_json(obj, filename)

   Write python object *obj* to a json file. Overwrite file if it already
   exists (without comfirmation prompt).
   filename: [str] excluding file extension


.. py:function:: name_from_config(area_config)

   Create a name [str] from area_config [dict].


.. py:function:: config_from_name(name)

   Create an area config [dict] from name [str].


.. py:function:: config_from_name_3a(name)

   Create an area config [dict] from name [str] where types are DDR, DSR, DSR_90
   L.


.. py:function:: template_from_config(area_config)


.. py:function:: visu_from_config(area_config, a, b)

   Only works for config with visu keys listed below.


.. py:function:: ind_from_config(area_config, creator)

   Create an individual [DepotPrototype] from area_config [dict].
   Requires a the deap creator to be setup. Depot a and b are taken from
   depot_layout_opt.settings.OPT_CONSTANTS (needs to be loaded before calling
   this function).


.. py:function:: template_from_name(name)


.. py:data:: power
   :value: 150
